comment.body: I think more than 75% of the top 1000 artists on Spotify are "owned" by the "Big Three" https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Record_label#3

>In terms of the scale of the killings, nuclear weapons are not very large, the largest being biological weapons. The most suitable use for a nuclear bomb is EMP.


North Korea has quite an arsenal of Biochemical weapons, they have done quite some testing on their (political) prisoners

朝鮮擁有相當多的生化武器, 他們對他們的 (政治) 囚犯做了相當多的測試
